text:
When selecting plain body on the SMTPSampler GUI, I expected the message text to be disabled.

Attached you will find a patch that does that. 

Additionally I changed the event lister from action lister to Change Lister in the suppress subject. This listener is more appropriate because the gui changes when loading a script without an action happening. This ends up with an incorrect gui state.
creator: moreira@privasphere.com
